metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27783 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
A XSS vulnerability was discovered in python-lxml's clean module. Themodule's parser didn't properly imitate browsers, which caused differentbehaviors between the sanitizer and the user's page. A remote attackercould exploit this flaw to run arbitrary HTML/JS code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-lxml - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.3
python3-lxml - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lxml package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.0-1ubuntu0.3').
